description: Polymer web component implementing multi-selectable behavior, defining properties and methods for managing multiple selections.

classes.name: Polymer.IronMultiSelectableBehavior
classes.description: Behavior combining IronSelectableBehavior and multi-select functionality.

methods.name: select
methods.description: Selects a value; toggles selection if multi is true, otherwise sets selected.

methods.name: multiChanged
methods.description: Observer for changes to the multi property, updates selection mode.

methods.name: _updateSelected
methods.description: Updates the selection state based on current properties.

methods.name: _toggleSelected
methods.description: Toggles the selection state of a value.
